title: QuotesApp
description: A simple CRUD application where users can add data and can remove it(if localstorage stats are stored), Like and dislike otherws quotes

title: Portfoilo cum Blog
description: This very webpage is one of my best frontend creations. Built with saber.js (a vue.js framework) this website is static-built like gatsby and is super fast. And using the full potential of React, there are a lot of things here

title: HandyWriter
description: With the help of marked.js this app turns yout markdown to HTML to normal text and HTML

title: Simple Parallex Effect
description: Without using any frameworks like bootstrap, I made this landing page with parallex scrolling, animated buttons and scroll to postion, this is basically a CSS showcase of my skills
